Review_title: Don't be afraid to ask questions
Review_Text:
The film makes important points that should be made and discussed.
The truth is that people have been so disillusioned and demoralised by propaganda that they will often react in defense of the deception since most will have trouble admitting they have been living a lie. This is exactly the kind of content everyone needs to hear and why free-speech and different perspectives are so important.

Review_title: This film is a must watch, especially for parents
Review_Text: Excellent film, based on fact. You know someone is onto something big when they are banned/shadow banned by mainstream search engines and platforms.

Review_title: Wake Up! Pharma is Killing Us!
Review_Text: Lots of verifiable facts presented in a casual digestible format that will keep my family MUCH safer now that I know.Follow the corrupt money starting in 1986 when Ronald Reagan signed the Vaccine Act.
